title: Thunderbird update lost address book and email.
content: The last version of Thunderbird that I downloaded and installed was V91.0.2 in 2021. When I installed this latest upgrade my email was totally screwed up. I lost my address book and everything else. Support finally gave up I guess because they quit replying to my posts. I have been just using GMail as my email host. I think I would like to try to be able to use Thunderbird again but, I assume it would require a totally new install and I have no idea where to start. I am not a computer guru so would need my hand held to do this. Thank you
creator: AZCowboy

title: mailto links don't work, "locked" subject, no account to select
content:
Hello! Since I couldn't find help in the forums, I will create a new question. For about a year now the PC at my work will not open mailto-links correctly. There is no account to select from, the subject has a lock-symbol. The receiver's address is correct though (I replaced it with "address" for the screenshot). This PC is the only one I know with that problem and only with external mailto-links. If I click on an email address inside a mail, it opens it correctly. Thunderbird version 115.11.1 (32-Bit), Win 10

It's pretty impractical, so I am hoping for help. Thank you!
creator: Phrimpy

title: Responder sobre el hilo de un correo utilizando una plantilla.
content:
Hola,

He creado una plantilla ingresando el código HTML (con estilos) para poder enviar mensajes de manera corporativa y estética.

Necesito saber cómo puedo responder mensajes entrantes utilizando esta plantilla. Es decir, sobre un hilo de correo de alguien que me escribe, necesto poder utilizar una plantilla para responder.

No logro encontrar la opción para responder sobre un correo recibido. Solamente puedo utilizar plantillas para crear un nuevo mensaje y agregar un remitente pero, no irá en relación con el hilo de correo que el emisor del mensaje ha creado escribiendo previamente.

Necesito vuestra ayuda, gracias de antemano.
creator: alejandro.gonzalez

creator: reversion45

title: Removing duplicates (30,000+ emails) systematically and **without** addons.
content:
Using Thunderbird 115.11.0 (64-bit) on Manjaro (Linux - fully updated). Thunderbird is a great and fantastic email client and I will always appreciate Mozilla for its principals.

I'm using IMAP and I moved some messages from a Gmail account to another IMAP account and somewhere along the way, an additional 10,000+ emails have been duplicated (about one third).

How can I systematically remove duplicates without the use of an add-on? The reason I don't wish to use an add-on is because every add-on I've found requires the following permission Have full, unrestricted access to Thunderbird, and your computer. and that is absolutely terrifying.

Are there any remedies for (systematically) handling duplicates without handing over all the keys to the kingdom?
creator: mozilla586

title: Posta certificata
content: Sul mio indirizzo pec non ricevo più messaggi dal 28/05/2024. Dall'applicazione del telefono mi risultano nuove pec, ma dal pc invece non riesco a visulaizzarle perchè non si aggiornano. come posso fare?
creator: segreteria31

title: Launching Thunderbird Stops Keyboard Working
content:
I have Thunderbird 115.11.1 running on a Mac Mini M2 Sonoma 14.5.

I use a Kensington USB PC Keyboard which is set to "British-PC" in the Mac Keyboard settings to give the correct layout.

If Thunderbird is the first app I launch after I log in (the password entry at this stage works fine) it seems to stop the keyboard from being recognised by the Mac until I go into another app (Google or Text Edit for instance) which then seems to make the Keyboard visible again.

Are there any settings in Thunderbird that might clash with the system keyboard settings and cause this?

If I use other apps before launching Thunderbird it works as normal, it seems to happen if Thunderbird is launched first.

Thanks for any help.
creator: cheapmachines

title: Gmail IMAP timeout
content: I have added my gmail account to TB and it downloads all the folders and emails correctly, but as soon as I try to move an email with an attachment from a local folder to a folder on the gmail acount I get "Connection to server imap.gmail.com timed out" errors.
creator: paul.rowell

title: Very wrong attributions of email, strange possible crosslinks
content:
Here is a very strange problem: 1. all my notifications about interac are attributed to only one person: INTERAC e-Transfer: A money transfer from X has been automatically deposited. Under correspondents I have Y, no matter what X is. 2. When I do a global search for INTERAC, all notifications show up, but attributed to Z, different from X and Y. Further, Z only sent me an interac transfer once, maybe 10 years ago. Indeed, if I global search for Z, none of the interac notifications show up. 3. this is ONLY on Thunderbird, not at the server.

Any ideas?
creator: gena4

title: Filters
content:
Ik gebruik meerdere mailaccounts in thunderbird. Van mijn belangrijkste mailadres verdwijnen alle mails in de spambox. Ik heb alle filtering uitgezet, maar dat helpt niet. Mijn andere mailadressen hebben dit probleem niet Ik begrijp het niet. Ik heb weleens gedacht dat het mailadress tonio.bike@live.nl het probleem is, En niet thunderbird. Hoe dan ook , het is rete vervelend. Ik heb weleens mails gemist. Hebben jullie een idee.

Vr. Groeten Tonio Visser

title: Changing your e-mail password within Thunderbird to enable incoming and outgoing email.
content: I have searched through forums and youtube. I can not locate an "options" or "security" tab anywhere in the menu structure. I want to change my email password to enable incoming and outgoing emails. My account is already established, I only want to change the password so Thunderbird can get and send from my email account.
creator: RRRichmond

title: Thunderbird executing filters randomly
content:
Hi, last week my Thunderbird started slowing down and then appeared an error which caused it to freeze (i wasn't there so i don't know what error). The program was force closed and opened again, and it started re-downloading messages in the inbox (probably repairing).

For some reason it also started running all the filters and sent a ton of old emails from the inbox. I closed it again and after opening it it worked fine, and it continued downloading messages during the weekend. Today it worked fine all day until it started running the filters again. I closed it and opened it again and it continued sending emails, so i had to close it.

I'm not sure but it may have happened after making a new filter, which is strange because i have about 180 filters and this never happened before.

I'm now afraid of opening thunderbird because it may continue sending emails.

Could this be a thunderbird bug or an add-on issue? I have Send Later as well as FiltaQuilla, which i disabled the last time i opened thunderbird.
creator: yellowmatter

title: Thunderbird
content:
I have used Thunderbird for some years with no problems, but today it has completely disappeared. The icons have gone, it is no longer listed under programs/applications, everything has just vanished. I have tried to locate Thunderbird profile folder but can't find that either. I use Windows 10 and have not had an update in the past few days. I also use Firefox and that is still fine.

I'm not a techie so don't know what else to try. I'm reluctant to install Thunderbird again because if possible I would like to recover my emails. Also, much as I like using it, there's no point if it's not reliable. I would be very grateful for your help and advice.
creator: eunicelawless

title: Downloading email from AT&T
content: I recently setup a new Windows 11 computer and installed the latest version of Thunderbird. I have two email accounts. The gmail account presented no problems. When I tried to setup the AT&T account I first obtained an authentication password and setup the account. While I can send email just fine, the account will not download any email. When I go on the AT&T server directly, there are new, sent and deleted email there. The server settings are set to SSL/TLS and OAuth2. What else do I need to setup before I can mail from the AT&T server?
creator: bw0803

title: Email setting
content: I have 2 different yahoo email accounts that I access through Thunderbird. When I added the 2nd account, it changed the SMTP Server Settings "user name" of the 1st one to the same as the new one. I received an error when I tried to send an email from the 1st account, after looking at the settings, i noticed the SMTP user name was wrong. When I changed it on the 1st account, it automatically changed it on the 2nd account as well.

title: Norton 360 updated now Thunderbird cant access outlook server
content:
Norton 360 updated last night and now Thunderbird isn't working.

I tried logging in to Thunderbird but it kept saying my certificate was wrong and refusing to check my emails. I tried to click "add exception" but it didn't help.

It also kept saying its own homepage was a security risk and blocking it.

I figured it was Nortons new update, but have no idea how to fix it. I turned off Nortons Email Protection, which didn't help. So I uninstalled Thunderbird and reinstalled it.

But now its saying it cannot login to the outlook server when I try to add an email account. I know the information is correct, all I can guess is that Norton is blocking it somehow?

Any idea on how I can fix this?
creator: zombeh
